sn4.8:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn4.8:1.3: Atha kho maro papima yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
sn4.8:2.4: Na hi so nandati yo nirupadhi”ti.
sn4.8:3.4: Na hi so socati yo nirupadhi”ti.
sn4.8:4.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam bhagava, janati mam sugato”ti dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
